Control.Title: Maps
Control.Description: Easily visualize data over a geographical area.

Sample.Title: Range Color Mapping
Sample.WhatsNew: Legend DataTemplate support has been added
Sample.Description: This sample shows the population density of the world map with range color mapping.

Sample.Title: Bubble
Sample.Description: This sample shows the statistics of the facebook users using the bubble support.

Sample.Title: Marker
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the world map with different time zones using markers.

Sample.Title: Selection
Sample.Description: This sample showcases a map with simple Selection.

Sample.Title: Sublayer
Sample.Description: This sample shows the rivers of the Australia using the shape sublayer support.
